title: Mod Physics (Patched)
author: Rehan30g
description: Welcome to the patched version of Mod Physics designed for mobile users.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Hello! Welcome to the patched version of Mod Physics. This mod is designed for mobile users, including Pojavlauncher, HMCL, and others.

sections.title: Information
list: This Mod is compatible with fabric 1.20.1.
Does not support any shader if you are using Optifabric or Iris.
Both Pro and Free versions are included.

sections.title: Attention
sections.content: This mod doesn't support Optifine Shaders, whether it's a pro or original version. Attempting to force it may result in crashes unless you use a zink renderer.

sections.title: Setup
sections.content: Watch this video to learn how to install Physics mod in Pojavlauncher:
sections.note: Please note that this patch does not support the arm32 device!

sections.title: Download
sections.content: Download or your soul will be gone.
